localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Androidâ„¢ DEVICES.

Can you "black out" all of the lit-up tiles in this addictive, challenging puzzle game?

Features include:
- 90 levels, ranging from Easy to Medium to Hard!
- Random Levels mode, featuring endless, randomly-generated levels of the difficulty you choose!
- Create your own puzzles in the Level Editor!
- 18 graphics themes to choose from!

Package size: 9594 KB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Game by Josh Forde

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
